name: Runny (bandinopla)
description:
Join Runny, a friendly lizard, as he embarks on a short run through the desert. Journey accross a beautiful arid landscape on a clear blue sky. 

Along the way you'll enconter the vegetation of the area will make the journey a bit harder than espected! Tap quickly on the screen to make our friend Runny jump and avoid any obstacle. How far can you go?!

[Controls] --> left mouse button to jump.
